articles.description: Skin cancer is a serious concern for many people, as it is one of the most common types of cancer worldwide. Nonetheless, there are measures you can adopt to decrease the likelihood of developing skin cancer.
articles.content: Skin cancer is a form of cancer that impacts the cells of the skin. It is caused by abnormal growth of skin cells due to damage to their DNA from ultraviolet radiation. The prevalence of skin cancer … [+2489 chars]
